content: this legal text is about a mutual consent divorce case involving a couple mr and mrs v they have reached an agreement on their matrimonial rights and arrangements for themselves and their children the text explains the progress of the legal case including information about their marriage their matrimonial regime and their assets and debts the couple has divided their property financial accounts and debts they have also settled their insurance policies pension savings and inheritance rights the text discusses the agreements made by the parties including the dismissal of property registration and the waiver of future claims it also mentions the division of costs and tax benefits the text concludes by stating that the parties have reached a mutual agreement and that the agreement can be enforced by third parties the parties have also agreed to share the costs and fees of the divorce proceedings the text includes statements regarding the parties identity marital status choice of domicile and financial declarations for tax purposes the agreement is subject to certain conditions and will be finalized with a ratification deed
